tasks.title: Delete a Project
tasks.description: Try deleting this project using the delete button (usually appears on hover).

tasks.title: Delete a Task List
tasks.description: Delete a task list from this project to see how it works.

tasks.title: Delete a Task
tasks.description: Remove a task from the list using the delete button.

tasks.title: Edit a Project
tasks.description: Edit the project name or details to personalize it.

tasks.title: Edit a Task List
tasks.description: Change the title of a task list to organize your tasks.

tasks.title: Edit a Task
tasks.description: Update a task's title or description.

tasks.title: Add a New Project
tasks.description: Create a new project to start organizing your tasks.

tasks.title: Add a New Task List
tasks.description: Add a new task list to any project.

tasks.title: Add a New Task
tasks.description: Add a new task to any task list.
